textBox.richText: Headed up solo to Copper; they opened the Flyer lift yesterday. Coin flip between them and Loveland...Copper’s top-to-bottom doing Excellerator was more appealing. Good choice...there were some bumps cutting through to Mine Dump, and they opened some of Hallelujah for part of the day. The vid from below: cutting from Mine Dump to Trail #20, and hitting some powder. Alli is pleased to see that this is one of the few times I fell *forward* (rather than back-seating it). I love the cheering from the lift afterwards...
